template-field-output.applicable: Template field is applicable for selected target
template-field-output.non-applicable: Template field is not applicable selected target
translation-field.tooltip.non-delete: Cannot remove field with template or test fields defined
translation-field.tooltip.copy: Copy translation output as translation goal
template-field.tooltip.required: Whether the field output should be valid for the template to be applicable
transformation-config.itemwise.enable: Apply transformation to each input value independently
transformation-config.itemwise.disable: Apply transformation to the entire input as a whole
target-result.template-selector.label: Translation template
target-result.title: Translation result for target {{path}}
target-result.applicable: Translation template can be used to translate the target selected
target-result.non-applicable: Translation template cannot be used to translate the target selected
target-result.score.tooltip.no-score: No translation goals defined for the target selected
field.item-type.label: Item type
field.item-type.validation: One of the Citoid/Zotero supported types (see https://aurimasv.github.io/z2csl/typeMap.xml)
field.title.label: Title
field.author-last.label: Authors' last/full names
field.author-first.label: Authors' first names
field.author-first.validation: One or more empty or non-empty strings
field.date.label: Date
field.date.validation: A single yyyy-mm-dd, yyyy-mm or yyyy value
field.publishedIn.label: Published in
field.publishedIn.description: Name of the work which contains the cited resource
field.publishedBy.label: Published by
field.language.label: Language
field.language.validation: An ISO 639-1, -2 or -3 code, or its corresponding IETF tag
field.control.label: Control
selection.citoid.label: Citoid selection
selection.citoid.description: Selects a field from the Citoid response for the target webpage
selection.citoid.config.field.label: Citoid field name
selection.citoid.config.field.descriptio: Any valid Citoid/Zotero base field name. Creator fields (e.g., "author") are split into creatorFirst and creatorLast fields.
selection.xpath.label: XPath selection
selection.xpath.description: Selects a node from the target webpage's HTML using XPath
selection.xpath.config.expression.label: XPath expression
selection.fixed.label: XPath selection
selection.fixed.description: Selects a node from the target webpage's HTML using XPath
selection.fixed.config.value.label: XPath expression
transformation.join.label: Join transformation
transformation.join.description: Joins two or more items in a list into one, using the separator specified
transformation.split.label: Split transformation
transformation.split.description: Splits a string at the separator specified into two or more substrings
transformation.date.label: Date transformation
transformation.date.description: Uses the Sugar.js to try and parse natural language dates into the YYYY-MM-DD format
transformation.date.config.separator.des: Any of the currently supported locales
transformation.range.label: Range transformation
transformation.range.description: Returns one or more items or ranges of items in the order specified
transformation.range.config.separator.de: One or more comma-separated ranges: "start(:end)", "start:" or ":end"
transformation.match.label: Match transformation
transformation.match.description: Returns one or more substrings matching a target
transformation.match.config.separator.de: The matching target, expressed as either plain string or /regular expression/
